main event: A civilian observed a round white object, the size of a grapefruit, that made a sound similar to a truck in Limon, Colorado on May 11, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 30 seconds and the object changed course from west to east and then north before fading out., The object was confirmed to be an aircraft despite insufficient data for complete evaluation., The observation was made in poor visibility conditions with scattered clouds and wind., The object was described as having an oval shape., The report indicated the location was unrestricted except for darkness.
